user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend and I need some ideas for food and desserts. Suggest some chicken dishes, desserts, and pizza that would be perfect for the party.

TaskList.description: Research popular chicken dishes suitable for a birthday party.
Research popular desserts suitable for a birthday party.
Research popular pizza options for a birthday party.
Compile all researched food and dessert ideas into a single document.
